channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Today's Close Up
channel.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Cookbook
channel.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple teach us how to make shinoda rolls with taro stalks, a simple fall dish suitable for festive occasions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Cookbook
channel.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make a simple fall treat that's both beautiful to look at and tasty to eat. Just boil edible chrysanthemums and serve with sweet vinegar.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: lotion tissues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Noguchi Tomohisa makes leather from discarded fish skin. We investigate his efforts to utilize waste in the seafood industry, and contribute to sustainability.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: This episode looks at Japan's leading shipping innovations, such as the world's first electric tanker and fuel-saving "air lubrication." Also, out-of-body illusions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: "Trails to Oishii Tokyo" is a show that focuses on Japanese food available at Tokyo's food market where every kind of fresh food is gathered from around the country.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: Ryogoku is known as the home of sumo. As we explore, we learn how the sport took root after a devastating fire in the 17th century. It turns out that the neighborhood has a history of bouncing back.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Yamamoto Riken won the 2024 Pritzker Prize, architecture's highest honor. For decades he has tried to use architecture to revitalize communities. Hear his vision for society and the spaces we build.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: A Secret Date
channel.desc: It's late at night, when all are fast asleep. A young man and woman huddle together along the veranda outside of a house, attending to a ... rooster. What could the pair be up to.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Kurosaki Yu is a blacksmith specializing in Echizen cutlery, a 700-year-old Japanese craft. His knives are sought after by chefs in Japan and overseas. He talks about achieving ultimate sharpness.
